description: Those n for which the absolute value of A059876[n] is prime.
comments: Of the first 511 terms of A059876, 278 are primes.
maple: positions(true,map(isprime,map(abs, A059876))); # positions function given in A059649.
mathematica: a[n_] := With[{s = Floor[Log[2, n]]}, (-1)^(n+1) + Sum[(-1)^(Floor[n/2^i] + 1)*Prime[i], {i, 1, s}] + If[1 == n, 1, Mod[s + 1, 2]*Prime[s]]];A059877 = Position[Array[a, 120], p_ /; PrimeQ[Abs[p]]] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 07 2016 *)
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 05 2001
